Title: Armies of One
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), John Romano
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Gordon and Deva find that they need Carrie in their lives and Rebecca receives a lesson in loyalty from Proctor. Meanwhile, Jason Hood's past catches up to him.
